title: HEALING + CEREMONY | materia-lumina
cleaned_text: top of page ceremony + healing WORK In addition to our design work, Materia Lumina also offers special healing ceremonies as part of our offerings in and to the world. This work is rooted in the shamanic healing realms and has the ability to deeply connect us back to nature and the great flow of life. Materia Lumina is dedicated to offering this work to anyone wanting a deeper and truer connection to the natural world, living energy, the greater cosmos, their loved ones and their very own heart and soul.
